events.name: Moved
events.description: When an issue or pull request is moved

events.name: Reordered
events.description: When an issue or pull request is reordered in a column

events.name: Status Change
events.description: When an issue or pull request is marked as blocked/ready

events.name: Milestone Change
events.description: When an issue or pull request has its milestone changed

events.name: Opened Or Closed
events.description: When an issue or pull request is opened or closed via HuBoard

events.name: Assigned
events.description: When an issue or pull request is assigned to someone
